document.full_text: people on a high-dose regimen of the cholesterol drug lipitor may have a slightly increased risk of developing type 2 diabetes -- particularly if they have several of the classic diabetes risk factors, a study published monday finds.
document.title: more evidence ties cholesterol drug, diabetes
lines_and_colors: people on a high-dose regimen of the cholesterol drug lipitor may have a slightly increased risk of developing type 2 diabetes -- particularly if they have several of the classic diabetes risk factors, a study published monday finds.
